title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1152.7 - Speed limit
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1152.7 - Speed limit

State Regulations

Vehicles in, at or upon any terminal or terminal highway
shall be operated in strict compliance with speed limits prescribed by the
authority as indicated by posted traffic signs. No vehicle shall exceed the
speed of 20 miles per hour. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1152.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
